events.name: Sculpting The Baphomet: A Conversation with Mark Porter
events.description: Join caretaker Jack Matirko for an interview with Baphomet sculptor Mark Porter to discuss the historical monument symbolizing so much of why we fight.

events.name: The Satanic Chef
events.description: Feast your eyes with Adam Ostrofsky in the kitchen of The Satanic Estate for a cooking workshop and Satanic conversations. Keep your eyes out for Sous-Chef Jack!

events.name: Coming out as a Satanist: My Personal Unveiling.
events.description: Join Dre Naylor as she unveils her journey in Satanism, her art process, her pilgrimage to Salem, The Devil's Dinners, working with other Satanic creators, and as she hails Satan. Let's talk about Satanism, community, Unveiling and the Devil.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Just Another Day in Hell
events.description: Celebrate Unveiling Day with Baphomet (as designed by Dee Mendes) from breakfast to bedtime. Concept developed by the Satanic Writers Circle, voiceover by Maryline Spicy.

events.name: Satanic Symbolism
events.description: Join Salem Witch Wiles' Thomas O' Brien Vallor, our favorite Salem witch and in-house historian, for a presentation on Satanic Symbolism.

events.name: The Satanic Estate interviews Anna Biller
events.description: TSE Caretaker, Morgane Ciot, interviews Anna Biller about The Love Witch, the art of cinema, witches, covens, Satanism & her upcoming projects.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Join Mercy for music and videos all night, live from Salem.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
